src:
Pro Sidebar Add-on

07 Nov 2019, 08:35

Andrew Peel writes:
The Pro Sidebar add-on was developed to help simplify and speed up my workflow while working with Blender.It provides me with a simplified interface, some helpful new tools, and an asset management engine all available from the Sidebar in 3D Viewport.The video below will give you a quick overview of how it works.I hope others in the community can find it helpful.
Links


About Pro Sidebar Add-on


Download Pro Sidebar Add-on
